newsitem.title: EU: REUTER EC REPORT LONG-TERM DIARY PART 13/14.
newsitem.headline: REUTER EC REPORT LONG-TERM DIARY PART 13/14.

text.p: STRASBOURG (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds plenary session (To January 17).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - General Affairs Council (To January 21).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds mini session (To January 30).
AMSTERDAM (NEW ITEM) - Informal Transport Council (To February 1).
NOORDWIJK, The Netherlands (NEW ITEM) - Informal Justice and Home Affairs Council (To February 6).
ROTTERDAM (NEW ITEM) - Informal Social Arfairs Council (To February 15).
STRASBOURG (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds plenary session (To February 21).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - General Affairs Council (To February 25).
AMSTERDAM (NEW ITEM) - Informal Development Council (To March 2).
STRASBOURG (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds plenary session (To March 14).
APELDOORN, The Netherland (NEW ITEM) - Informal General Affairs Council (To March 16).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - Justice and Home Affairs Council (To March 19).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - General Affairs Council (To March 25).
NOORDWIJK, The Netherlands (NEW ITEM) - Informal ECOFIN Council (To April 6).
STRASBOURG (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds plenary session (To April 11).
AMSTERDAM (NEW ITEM) - Informal Environment Council (To April 20).
BRUSSELS (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds mini session (To April 24).
STRASBOURG (NEW ITEM) - European Parliament holds plenary session (To May 16).
VENUE TO BE CONFIRMED - EU foreign ministers hold Inter-governmental conference (IGC) conclave ahead of European summit (To May 26).
DOMBURG, The Netherlands (NEW ITEM) - Informal Farm Council (To May 27). END OF DOCUMENT.
